summary: Katrine moves to a student residence in Copenhagen. She's told the myth of the ghost from room 205. But when a mirror breaks an evil spirit is released and the body count starts.
cast: Neel Rønholt|Mikkel Arndt|Julie R. Ølgaard|Mira Wanting|Jon Lange|Rikke Lylloff|Steen Stig Lommer|Tania Maria Odgaard|Rasmus Flensborg|Morten Brovn Jørgensen|Michael Grønnemose|Jos Gylling|Thomas Clausen|Peter Hald|Brian Laursen
title: Kollegiet
